name: Dapzilla Bandwidth Monitor
summary: Client to monitor Wildblue Satellite internet customers usage.
short_description:
Client to monitor Wildblue Satellite Internet usage inside the USA and save it in a file on your computer. To track your usage. Uses standard non password protected unencripted html links from the wb xml server to access data.

This client reads usage data in the same way your browser does from the XML data using web HTML links it does not logon.


You must be a Wildblue customer to use this software.
